description: Gets settings for a column statistics task.

parameters.name: DatabaseName
parameters.description: The name of the database where the table resides.

parameters.name: TableName
parameters.description: The name of the table for which to retrieve column statistics.

nested_items.name: ColumnStatisticsTaskSettings
nested_items.description: A ColumnStatisticsTaskSettings object representing the settings for the column statistics task.

nested_items.name: DatabaseName
nested_items.description: The name of the database where the table resides.

nested_items.name: TableName
nested_items.description: The name of the table for which to generate column statistics.

nested_items.name: ScheduleExpression
nested_items.description: A cron expression used to specify the schedule (see Time-Based Schedules for Jobs and Crawlers. For example, to run something every day at 12:15 UTC, you would specify: cron(15 12 * * ? *).

nested_items.name: ColumnNameList
nested_items.description: A list of column names for which to run statistics.

nested_items.name: CatalogID
nested_items.description: The ID of the Data Catalog in which the database resides.

nested_items.name: Role
nested_items.description: The role used for running the column statistics.

nested_items.name: SampleSize
nested_items.description: The percentage of data to sample.

nested_items.name: SecurityConfiguration
nested_items.description: Name of the security configuration that is used to encrypt CloudWatch logs.

nested_items.name: ScheduleType
nested_items.description: The type of schedule for a column statistics task. Possible values may be CRON or AUTO.

nested_items.name: SettingSource
nested_items.description: The source of setting the column statistics task. Possible values may be CATALOG or TABLE.

nested_items.name: LastExecutionAttempt
nested_items.description: The last ExecutionAttempt for the column statistics task run.

nested_items.name: Status
nested_items.description: The status of the last column statistics task run.

nested_items.name: ColumnStatisticsTaskRunId
nested_items.description: A task run ID for the last column statistics task run.

nested_items.name: ExecutionTimestamp
nested_items.description: A timestamp when the last column statistics task run occurred.

nested_items.name: ErrorMessage
nested_items.description: An error message associated with the last column statistics task run.
